heading: Mercyâ€™s Reach Dungeon Guide
content: Mercy's Reach contains one of Necromancer's highest damage multipliers for Blood builds, the . The dungeon is long and winding so it's not recommended for grinding out levels or Nightmare Sigils. Look elsewhere for your dungeon blasting. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
